info.title: Godam API
info.description: Godam API Documentation for integrating godam with other applications for performing operations related to warehouse management system like inbound/outbound!

parameters.name: model_name
parameters.description: name of the model for the autocompletion(FC/ST)

parameters.name: facility_num
parameters.description: name of the associated fulfillment center

parameters.name: client_store_id
parameters.description: for name of the associated supplier stores link with client store id

parameters.description: name of the fulfillment center associated with the user

default.description: unable to perform the quality action on the given serial number

password2.description: Password field 2, Should match with password1
